QuestData.Title: Gatekeeper's Challenge: Cunning
QuestData.Description: Archimonde expected greatness from his pupils. Only the most imaginative minds, the most adroit of intellects, could ever truly fathom the deepest reaches of our magic.$b$bI doubt you can relate.$b$bThe path to the left will take you to a set of three statues. Use them to collect a Mark of Cunning.$b$bTo preserve the integrity of this trial, I will not be able to provide hints. If you do, by some miracle, happen to succeed, I will formally recognize your... brilliance.
QuestData.LogDescription: Collect a Fragment of Acuity, Wit, and Guile and combine them into a Mark of Cunning.
QuestData.CompletionText: Display the Mark of Cunning or leave me alone.
